paragraphs: I finally located the entrance to the Ayleid tomb just to the northeast of Phaer. It appears to be deserted and I look forward to exploring its mysteries. I had planned to mount a full expedition on the morrow, but I met the most enchanting woman last eve at the Salted Wings tavern.

I hope to see her again tonight. Her skin was so pale it seemed almost to glow, and her lips … her lips were the most delicious ruby red. Hopefully I'll be able to work up the courage to speak to her this time.
